multitext.text: ARE YOU SURE YOUR MONEY IS SAFE?
HIDE ENVELOPES! EACH HIDEOUT CAN HOLD UP TO 4 CASH ENVELOPES ONLY 2 HIDEOUTS ARE SAFE
AUTHORITIES ARE ABOUT TO RAID 2 PLACES
EVERYONE WANTS TO MEET TONY CHOOSE THE ONE WHO WILL SEE HIM
TONY HAS MORE TIME CHOOSE THE ONE WHO WILL SEE HIM NOW
GLAD SOME BUSINESS ARRANGEMENT COULD BE MADE
GLAD THINGS COULD BE SORTED OUT
GOOD, WE STRAIGHTENED THINGS OUT WITHIN THE FAMILY
YOU’VE DONE THE FAMILY A GREAT SERVICE
PICK A CONTAINER TO REVEAL ITS CASH PRIZE CHOOSE WHETHER TO KEEP THE PRIZE OR FORFEIT IT AND TRY ANOTHER CONTAINER. THE BANK OF PRIZES IS LISTED ON THE RIGHT. UP TO 3 PICKS ARE ALLOWED
VALUE OF STOLEN GOODS IN THE DIFFERENT CONTAINERS
PICK A CONTAINER TO HIT AND REVEAL THE STOLEN GOODS
CRIME FAMILY FREE GAMES WITH 4 MODES
SUBSTITUTES FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER, STOLEN GOODS SYMBOL AND BADA BING SYMBOL
YOUR CURRENT FREE GAMES LEVEL IS:

UNLOCK 4 FREE GAMES MODES: SOLDIER, CAPO, BOSS, AND FAMILY EACH FREE GAMES MODE HAS DIFFERENT RULES. PICK WHICH MODE TO PLAY FROM THE MODES YOU HAVE UNLOCKED THE UNLOCKING PROCESS IS PRESENTED IN THE PROGRESS BAR, UNDERNEATH THE 4 FREE GAMES MODES
UNLOCKING IS DONE FROM LEFT TO RIGHT: SOLDIER, CAPO, BOSS, FAMILY RESPECTIVELY UNLOCKING A MODE OCCURS WHEN 3 BARS ARE FILLED UNDER THAT MODE: FILLING THE PROGRESS BAR WILL CHANGE IT TO A SELECT BUTTON. ONCE A MODE HAS BEEN UNLOCKED IT STAYS THAT WAY FOR THE DURATION OF THE GAME EVEN AFTER EXITING AND RE-ENTERING THE GAME ONCE YOU HAVE UNLOCKED MORE THAN ONE MODE, YOU MAY CHOOSE WHICH MODE TO PLAY BY CLICKING SELECT UNDER THE CHOSEN MODE SOLDIER MODE UNLOCKS ON 1st FREE GAMES TRIGGER

3 SCATTER IN THE MAIN GAME ==> 1 STEP IN THE PROGRESS BAR 4 OR 5 SCATTER IN THE MAIN GAME ==> 2 STEPS IN THE PROGRESS BAR SCATTER DURING FREE GAMES WINS AS PER PAYTABLE BUT DOES NOT TRIGGER MORE FREE GAMES
CRISTOPHER IS EXTRA WILD, SUBSTITUTING FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER AND WILD CRISTOPHER ANYWHERE ON REEL 3 IN CENTER POSITION WINS 5 MORE FREE GAMES MORE FREE GAMES CAN BE WON INFINITELY

FREE GAMES START WITH A RANDOM INITIAL MULTIPLIER OF x2, x3, x4 OR x5 IF ONE OR MORE PAULIE APPEARS ANYWHERE IN THE SPIN MULTIPLIER GROWS +1 IF NO PAULIE APPEARS ON THE REELS, THE MULTIPLIER GOES DOWN -1. MULTIPLIER CANNOT BE LOWER THAN x2 THE APPEARANCE OF PAULIE WILL ONLY AFFECT THE MULTIPLIER OF THE NEXT SPIN CAPO FREE GAMES CANNOT BE RETRIGGERED

2 TO 5 ADDITIONAL EXTRA WILDS ARE DISTRIBUTED RANDOMLY ON THE REELS DURING EVERY SPIN. SCATTER WINS ARE COUNTED BEFORE WILDS ARE DISTRIBUTED WILD ANYWHERE ON REEL 3 IN THE CENTER POSITION WINS 5 MORE FREE GAMES EXTRA WILD CANNOT RETRIGGER FREE GAMES MORE FREE GAMES CAN BE WON INFINITELY
ONLY THE 5 FAMILY MEMBERS WILD, PAULIE, CHRISTOPHER, JOHNNY, BOBBIE AS WELL AS ARTIE AND SCATTER APPEARS ON THE REELS WILD DOUBLES ALL WINS WHEN SUBSTITUTING FAMILY FREE GAMES CANNOT BE RETRIGGERED
TRIGGERED RANDOMLY DURING THE MAIN GAME

THE AUTHORITIES ARE ABOUT TO RAID 2 OF YOUR LOCATIONS! HIDE 4 CASH ENVELOPES IN 4 HIDEOUTS. YOU MAY STASH 0 TO 4 ENVELOPES IN ANY LOCATION. EACH ENVELOPE HOLDS 2X TOTAL BET ONCE ALL ENVELOPES HAVE BEEN STASHED YOU CAN CHOOSE WHETHER TO CONTINUE WITH YOUR SELECTION OR DISTRIBUTE ENVELOPES AGAIN ONLY 2 OF THE HIDEOUT LOCATIONS ARE SAFE! YOU WIN THE ACCUMULATED CASH VALUE OF ANY OF THE ENVELOPES YOU HID SUCCESSFULLY IN THE 2 SAFE HIDEOUTS BONUS CANNOT BE TRIGGERED DURING FREE GAMES
ANYWHERE ON REELS 2+3+4 DURING THE MAIN GAME

ARTIE, BOBBY, CHRISTOPHER, JOHNNY AND PAULIE ARE WAITING TO MEET TONY CHOOSE WHO TONY WILL SEE NEXT. ANY CHOICE WINS A CASH PRIZE ONCE ANY OF THE GUYS ENTERS THE ROOM 1 OF 2 THINGS CAN HAPPEN: 1. MEETING ENDS AND PLAYER CAN CHOOSE ANOTHER GUY TO GO IN AND MEET TONY 2. THE BONUS ROUND ENDS AND PLAYER RETURNS TO MAIN GAME
ANYWHERE ON REELS 1+5 DURING THE MAIN GAME

PLAN THE BIG HEIST! YOU HAVE INFORMATION ABOUT 10 CONTAINERS. THE CASH PRIZES OF ALL CONTAINERS ARE FOUND AT THE SIDE OF THE SCREEN, BUT YOU DO NOT KNOW WHICH CONTAINER IS WORTH WHICH PRIZE PICK A CONTAINER TO REVEAL ITS CASH PRIZE AFTER SEEING THE VALUE OF THE PRIZE YOU CAN KEEP THE PRIZE OR CHANGE THE CONTAINER AND PICK AGAIN. UP TO 3 PICKS CAN BE PLAYED. 3RD PICK IS FINAL AND CANNOT BE SWAPPED BONUS CANNOT BE TRIGGERED DURING FREE GAMES
ONLY HIGHEST WIN PAYS PER LINE WIN COMBINATIONS PAY LEFT TO RIGHT ONLY EXCEPT SCATTER WHICH PAYS ANY PAYLINE WINS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE LINE BET MALFUNCTIONS VOID ALL PLAYS AND PAYS
3 OR MORE SCATTER SYMBOL ANYWHERE START THE CRIME FAMILY FREE GAMES!
STOLEN GOODS SYMBOL ANYWHERE ON REELS 1+5 WINS STOLEN GOODS BONUS!
BADA BING SYMBOL ANYWHERE ON REELS 2+3+4 WINS BADA BING BONUS!
CHRISTOPHER IS EXTRA WILD CHRISTOPHER IN CENTER OF REEL 3 WINS 5 MORE FREE GAMES
WITH RANDOM WILDS WILD IN CENTER OF REEL 3 WINS 5 MORE FREE GAMES
ONLY FAMILY MEMBERS, ARTIE AND SCATTER ON REELS WILD DOUBLE WINS WHEN SUBSTITUTING
PLAY MORE TO ADVANCE IN RANK

phrase.text: PICK A CONTAINER TO HIT AND REVEAL THE STOLEN GOODS
KEEP THE GOODS OR PICK A DIFFERENT CONTAINER
KEEP THE GOODS FROM CHOSEN CONTAINER

The Sopranos
5-Reel 25-Line Slots
The Sopranos objective is to obtain winning symbol combinations by spinning the reels.
TO PLAY THE GAME: LINE BET Displays the current bet pet line. Click the ‘+’ or ‘-‘ buttons to change this.
LINES Displays the number of active lines. Click the ‘+’ or ‘-‘ buttons to change this.
TOTAL BET Shows the line bet multiplied by the number of paylines.
SPIN Clicking ‘SPIN’ spins the reels with the selected LINES, LINE BET and TOTAL BET.
BET MAX Clicking ‘BET MAX’ spins the reels and the maximum possible BET PER LINE.
INFO Click the ‘INFO’ button to view winning paylines and payout information. Scroll through INFO screens by using the left and right arrows. To Exit the PAYTABLE click the ‘BACK’ button.
WIN Displays the winning amount.
AUTO PLAY There is an auto start function available that will start each spin automatically until either something occurs that requires your intervention or the number of set spins expires. Selecting your desired number of spins will automatically commence AUTO SPINS. Clicking the STOP button beneath the AUTO SPINS indicator will stop AUTO PLAY.
ABOUT PAYOUTS: * If two winning combinations occur on the same line, the higher of them is paid out. * Win combinations must occur from left to right and on an active payline. * The Wild Symbol is represented by the Tony Soprano symbol. It can stand for any other symbol, excluding Scatter, Stolen Goods or Bada Bing symbols, to make the best possible winning combination. * There is a separate payout for 2 or more consecutive Wild Symbols on an active payline.
Payouts shown in the paytable are multiplied by the line bet, not by the total bet. If more than one active payline has a winning combination, the winnings are added up.
SCATTER SYMBOL: * Scatter symbols do not have to occur on a particular payline. * Payout for scatter symbols is multiplied by the total Bet. * If there are 3 or more Scatters in the spin results, the payout earned is multiplied by the total bet and added to payline winnings. * 3 or more scatters anywhere win the Crime Family Free Games. * Press “CLICK TO START” to begin each bonus. *Press “CONTINUE” to return to the regular reels when the bonus ends.
CRIME FAMILY FREE GAMES * Select your free games mode, there are four game modes to choose from although 3 will be locked until further free spins are triggered. *Each time free spins bonus is triggered you will be awarded points which will be used to advance in rank and unlock further game modes. * Detailed information over specific modes can be found in the INFO table.
DISPLAY * Remaining spins are displayed above the reels. * FREE GAMES WIN – Indicates current winnings from free spins. * MULTIPLIER – Indicates the multiplier.
RAID BONUS * Triggered randomly in the main game. * Distribute the four envelopes of cash in any of the four hideouts, each hideout can hide up to 4 cash envelopes. * Only two hideouts are safe. * You will be asked to confirm your selection before the raid occurs.
STOLEN GOODS BONUS * The Bonus is triggered when the Stolen Goods symbol appears on reels 1 and 5. * Picking a container will reveal a cash prize, the player can either keep the prize or try another. * The player is limited to a set amount of picks indicated above the map.
BADA BING BONUS * The Bonus is triggered when the Bada Bing symbol appears on reels 2, 3 and 4. * Choose the one who will see Tony Soprano. * One of two possible outcomes will occur for each choice: 1. The meeting ends and the player can choose another guy to go in and meet Tony 2. The bonus ends and the player returns to the main game.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
This game has a Return to Player of 94%.
